tray.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a flat piece of plastic, metal, or wood, with raised edges, used for carrying things such as plates, food etc
tray.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The waiter brought drinks on a tray.
tray.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a flat open container with three sides used for holding papers, documents etc on a desk
out tray (=for holding documents you have dealt with)
tray.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a flat open container with four sides used for holding certain things
seed tray (=a tray in which you plant seeds)
